product_name: Salomon SNS XA Manual Backcountry Ski Bindings
long_description: Mount the Salomon SNS(R) XA(R) Manual backcountry ski bindings on a pair of metal edge skis and enjoy the quiet solitude of an untracked snowy slopes. Wide platforms allow good power transmission from your boots to the bindings to the skis. Full-length guide ridges enhance control of the skis while gliding. Bindings open and close manually for a secure grasp on your boots. Salomon SNS(R) XA(R) Manual backcountry ski bindings have a 185 stiffness flex that is tuned for skiing in rolling terrain off the groomed trails. Bindings are compatible with boots that have the SNS X-ADV outsole, such as the Salomon X-ADV 6 cross-country ski boots (sold separately). Not compatible with SNS or SNS Pilot boot outsoles.
short_description: Mount the Salomon SNS(R) XA(R) Manual backcountry ski bindings on a pair of metal edge skis and enjoy the quiet solitude of an untracked snowy slopes.
